results.content: Sometimes the concepts have NOT been explained clearly in the course.  The course flow can be organized in a better way rather than jumping among different topics.
results.content_html: Sometimes the concepts have NOT been explained clearly in the course. The course flow can be organized in a better way rather than jumping among different topics.

results.content:
The content is very broad and useful. Although I was preparing just for the cloud practitioner certification, I watched all sections. The vast majority of videos were very understandable and I had no issues with them.

The reason why I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that some videos are a bit outdated (AWS console got some UI updates and following steps in videos/labs was not always easy) and could be structured better (there were cases when in one section I saw a video part two and in the next one there were the first part; besides, in the last section most videos are duplicated from previous sections, putting them in a separate category would be much better)
results.content_html:

results.content: Took the sample certification test, reviewed the things I didn't know, then passed the exam first try.
results.content_html: Took the sample certification test, reviewed the things I didn't know, then passed the exam first try.

results.content: Some parts need to be updated, especially a couple of the more advanced labs. Otherwise, a very comprehensive and easy to grasp course.
results.content_html: Some parts need to be updated, especially a couple of the more advanced labs. Otherwise, a very comprehensive and easy to grasp course.

results.content:
I am still going through the course videos and so far from what I have learnt this course is not just designed for passing an exam. It gives you real live examples and reasons as well as  explanations. The instructor aim is to make you learn what is required on the job and the concepts needed along the way. I have done  previous course already but decided to learn from another instructor .I can say have not regretted buying this course!
I will recommend it to any one!

results.content: This is an old course and talks about the services back in 2017. But if you are just here for the information, go for it. However, if you want to pass the exam in 2022 or onwards, buy the latest and updated versions.
results.content_html: This is an old course and talks about the services back in 2017. But if you are just here for the information, go for it. However, if you want to pass the exam in 2022 or onwards, buy the latest and updated versions.

results.content: Covers a lot. It over prepares you which is not a bad thing. If you UNDERSTAND (emphasis on understand) what he is teaching, you should do well on the exams. Of course, try your hands on practice questions too before the exam.
